001package io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.components.accordion;
002
003import io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.selenium.smart.SmartWebElement;
004import io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.util.strategy.Strategy;
005import java.util.List;
006import org.openqa.selenium.By;
007
008/**
009 * Defines the contract for an accordion UI component.
010 *
011 * <p>An accordion typically consists of multiple sections or panels
012 * that can be expanded or collapsed to show or hide content.
013 * Implementations of this interface provide consistent ways to
014 * manipulate accordion panels by expanding or collapsing them,
015 * as well as checking their state.
016 *
017 * @author Cyborg Code Syndicate üíçüë®üíª
018 */
019public interface Accordion {
020
021   /**
022    * Expands specific accordion panels within a given container.
023    *
024    * @param container     The container element holding the accordion.
025    * @param accordionText One or more text labels identifying the panels to expand.
026    */
027   void expand(SmartWebElement container, String... accordionText);
028
029   /**
030    * Expands an accordion panel determined by a strategy,
031    * such as selecting a random or first panel.
032    *
033    * @param container The container element holding the accordion.
034    * @param strategy  The strategy for determining which panel to expand.
035    * @return A string indicating which panel was expanded, if applicable.
036    */
037   String expand(SmartWebElement container, Strategy strategy);
038
039   /**
040    * Expands one or more accordion panels by text label, without specifying a container.
041    *
042    * @param accordionText One or more text labels identifying the panels to expand.
043    */
044   void expand(String... accordionText);
045
046   /**
047    * Expands accordion panels identified by one or more locators.
048    *
049    * @param accordionLocator One or more {@link By} locators for the target panels.
050    */
051   void expand(By... accordionLocator);
052
053   /**
054    * Collapses specific accordion panels within a given container.
055    *
056    * @param container     The container element holding the accordion.
057    * @param accordionText One or more text labels identifying the panels to collapse.
058    */
059   void collapse(SmartWebElement container, String... accordionText);
060
061   /**
062    * Collapses an accordion panel determined by a strategy.
063    *
064    * @param container The container element holding the accordion.
065    * @param strategy  The strategy for determining which panel to collapse.
066    * @return A string indicating which panel was collapsed, if applicable.
067    */
068   String collapse(SmartWebElement container, Strategy strategy);
069
070   /**
071    * Collapses one or more accordion panels by text label, without specifying a container.
072    *
073    * @param accordionText One or more text labels identifying the panels to collapse.
074    */
075   void collapse(String... accordionText);
076
077   /**
078    * Collapses accordion panels identified by one or more locators.
079    *
080    * @param accordionLocator One or more {@link By} locators for the target panels.
081    */
082   void collapse(By... accordionLocator);
083
084   /**
085    * Checks whether specific accordion panels are enabled within a given container.
086    *
087    * @param container     The container element holding the accordion.
088    * @param accordionText One or more text labels identifying the panels to check.
089    * @return {@code true} if all specified panels are enabled, otherwise {@code false}.
090    */
091   boolean areEnabled(SmartWebElement container, String... accordionText);
092
093   /**
094    * Checks whether specific accordion panels (by text) are enabled, without a container.
095    *
096    * @param accordionText One or more text labels identifying the panels to check.
097    * @return {@code true} if all specified panels are enabled, otherwise {@code false}.
098    */
099   boolean areEnabled(String... accordionText);
100
101   /**
102    * Checks whether accordion panels identified by one or more locators are enabled.
103    *
104    * @param accordionLocator One or more {@link By} locators for the target panels.
105    * @return {@code true} if all specified panels are enabled, otherwise {@code false}.
106    */
107   boolean areEnabled(By... accordionLocator);
108
109   /**
110    * Retrieves a list of text labels for accordion panels currently in an expanded state within a container element.
111    *
112    * @param container The container element holding the accordion.
113    * @return A list of expanded panel labels.
114    */
115   List<String> getExpanded(SmartWebElement container);
116
117   /**
118    * Retrieves a list of text labels for accordion panels currently in an expanded state identified by a locator.
119    *
120    * @param containerLocator The {@link By} locator for the accordion elements.
121    * @return A list of expanded panel labels.
122    */
123   List<String> getExpanded(By containerLocator);
124
125   /**
126    * Retrieves a list of text labels for accordion panels currently in a collapsed state within a container element.
127    *
128    * @param container The container element holding the accordion.
129    * @return A list of collapsed panel labels.
130    */
131   List<String> getCollapsed(SmartWebElement container);
132
133   /**
134    * Retrieves a list of text labels for accordion panels currently in a collapsed state identified by a locator.
135    *
136    * @param containerLocator The {@link By} locator for the accordion elements.
137    * @return A list of collapsed panel labels.
138    */
139   List<String> getCollapsed(By containerLocator);
140
141   /**
142    * Retrieves a list of all panel labels within the accordion container,
143    * regardless of their expanded or collapsed state.
144    *
145    * @param container The container element holding the accordion.
146    * @return A list of all panel labels in the accordion.
147    */
148   List<String> getAll(SmartWebElement container);
149
150   /**
151    * Retrieves a list of all panel labels identified by a locator,
152    * regardless of their expanded or collapsed state.
153    *
154    * @param containerLocator The {@link By} locator for the accordion elements.
155    * @return A list of all panel labels in the accordion.
156    */
157   List<String> getAll(By containerLocator);
158
159   /**
160    * Retrieves the title text from a specific accordion panel using a locator.
161    *
162    * @param accordionLocator The {@link By} locator identifying the target panel.
163    * @return The title text of the accordion panel.
164    */
165   String getTitle(By accordionLocator);
166
167   /**
168    * Retrieves the main text content from a specific accordion panel using a locator.
169    *
170    * @param accordionLocator The {@link By} locator identifying the target panel.
171    * @return The text content of the accordion panel.
172    */
173   String getText(By accordionLocator);
174}
